description: Returns information about a worker configuration.

parameters.name: workerConfigurationArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the worker configuration that you want to get information about.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The time that the worker configuration was created.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the worker configuration.

nested_items.name: latestRevision
nested_items.description: The latest revision of the custom configuration.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The time that the worker configuration was created.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the worker configuration revision.

nested_items.name: propertiesFileContent
nested_items.description: Base64 encoded contents of the connect-distributed.properties file.

nested_items.name: revision
nested_items.description: The description of a revision of the worker configuration.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the worker configuration.

nested_items.name: workerConfigurationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the custom configuration.

nested_items.name: workerConfigurationState
nested_items.description: The state of the worker configuration.
